data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in San Vicente, El Salvador to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San Vicente, El Salvador
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of San Vicente, El Salvador.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 86,459 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Jesus, defend your people in the state of San Vicente against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Turk people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of San Vicente, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 78,459 believers living in San Vicente, El Salvador.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 174,600 souls in San Vicente and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
